Data:

Subject:REPORT RESTORE DATABASE

--NextPart
Content-Type: text/plain;

--NextPart--
Content-Type: text/plain;
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="/var/log/user-data.log"

'$(cat report.txt)'.

--NextPart--
